summary: Blast your foes from here halfway to Hammerfell.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Book Antiqua][color=#CC0000][size=+2]This... is my [/size][size=+3]BOOM[/size][size=+2] stick!![/size][/color]
[size=+1]Okay, it's not a 12-gauge double-barreled Remington, but this staff packs a punch.

Comes in a [b][i]variety of styles[/i][/b] (including Daedric)!

You can find them in the sporting goods department of [b][i]Drelas' Cottage[/i][/b]. Inside of an ordinary chest, for some reason.

You might find a few other magical prototypes in there as well ;)[/size]

[color=#CC0000][size=+2]WARNING![/size][/color]
[size=+1]Under the right conditions, NPCs can be literally [b][i]blown off the map[/i][/b] or otherwise [b][i]lost forever[/i][/b]–taking all their stuff with them. There is a real possibility that you could break important quests–or worse. So basically, [b][i]don't be a dope[/i][/b]. With great power comes great responsibility. [b][i]You have been warned![/i][/b][/size]

[/font]
author: ioannes
